item.title: How to Edit the Microsoft Notepad Display (Windows 11)
item.description: This tutorial covers: How to Change the Font: With Menu With Settings How to Change the Reading Order How to Insert Unicode Control Characters How to Exit the “Go To” Window How to Apply Reconversion No time to scroll down? Click through these tutorial slides: Follow along with a video tutorial: How to Change the Font With Menu Step 1: First edit a Notepad file. In the upper left click the “Edit” button.
